articles.title: PM Modi, UK's Boris Johnson speak on Ukraine situation, bilateral issues - Mint
articles.description: PM Modi reiterated India’s consistent appeal for cessation of hostilities and a return to the path of dialogue and diplomacy.
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday had a phone call with his UK counterpart The Rt Hon Boris Johnson MP. Both the leaders had a detailed discussion on the situation in Ukraine.

articles.title: Firestorm in Bengal over Birbhum arson that killed 8, BJP seeks President’s Rule | Top Points - India Today
articles.description: At least eight people were charred to death in an arson incident in Bengal's Birbhum on Tuesday. In the aftermath, battle lines are clearly drawn as the BJP demanded President's Rule in the state and the ruling TMC denied all involvement in the incident.
